titles.title: A bill to terminate the application of certain Veterans' Administration regulations relating to transportation of claimants and beneficiaries in connection with Veterans' Administration medical care.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

bill.summary: 4/21/1987--Introduced. Terminates the application of certain Veterans Administration (VA) regulations relating to the reimbursement of transportation costs of claimants and beneficiaries in connection with medical care provided by the VA.
